body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/items[at0002]/value as T0_specific_disease,
  a/data[at0001]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.disease_group_rd_gel.v0]/items[at0001]/value as T0_disease_group,
  a/data[at0001]/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.disease_group_rd_gel.v0]/items[at0002]/value as T0_disease_subgroup,
  c/context/other_context/items[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.participant_gel.v0]/items[at0017]/value as T0_participant_type
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    EVALUATION a[openEHR-EHR-EVALUATION.problem_diagnosis.v1]
  )
LIMIT
  1
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
